TEXT_PRIVACY_POLICY_NOTE: If you are deleting your account due to privacy concerns, consider checking our Privacy Policy. We do not sell or share your data with third parties.
TEXT_ACCOUNT_OWNER_WARNING: You are an account owner. Deleting your account deletes this tenant.

TEXT_NO_SELL_DATA: Note that FastComments does not sell or share your personal information with third parties. We offer free account creation simply as a convenience.
